Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Ultra Blood Glucose Monitoring System
OneTouch UltraSoft Blood Sampler with OneTouch ClearCap
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Ultra Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood for in vitro diagnostic use by people with diabetes at home and/or by healthcare professionals to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control, specifically for use on finger, forearm, or palm.
